de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.tnccs.message.handler

Interface TnccsMessageHandler

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ImcHandler, ImvHandler, TnccHandler, TnccsHandler, TncsHandler
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultImcHandler, DefaultImvHandler, DefaultTnccHandler, DefaultTncsHandler

    interface TnccsMessageHandler
    Generic handler base to handle and collect IF-TNCCS messages.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void dumpMessage(TnccsMessage message)
      Forwards the messages to the handler but does not allow the handler to send messages in return.
      List<TnccsMessage> forwardMessage(TnccsMessage message)
      Handles a message and returns a list of messages if necessary.
      List<TnccsMessage> lastCall()
      Notifies the handler that all already collected messages will be send.
      List<TnccsMessage> requestMessages()
      Requests a list of messages the handler wants to send.
      void setConnectionState(de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.connection.TncConnectionState state)
      Notifies the handler that the state of the related connection has changed.

    • Method Detail

      • setConnectionState

        void setConnectionState(de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.connection.TncConnectionState state)
        Notifies the handler that the state of the related connection has changed.
        Parameters:
        state - the connection state

      • requestMessages

        List<TnccsMessage> requestMessages()
        Requests a list of messages the handler wants to send.
        Returns:
        a list of messages

      • forwardMessage

        List<TnccsMessage> forwardMessage(TnccsMessage message)
        Handles a message and returns a list of messages if necessary.
        Parameters:
        message - the message to handle
        Returns:
        a list of messages

      • lastCall

        List<TnccsMessage> lastCall()
        Notifies the handler that all already collected messages will be send. The handler can send further messages if necessary.
        Returns:
        a list of messages

      • dumpMessage

        void dumpMessage(TnccsMessage message)
        Forwards the messages to the handler but does not allow the handler to send messages in return.
        Parameters:
        message - the message to dump
